page.title: 20 STONE C.E. COMBINED SCH.
page.content: BUILT OVER 100 YEARS AGO THE SCHOOL WAS ENLARGED 10 YEARS AGO. IT NOW ACCOMODATES SEVEN CLASSES AND HAS EIGHT TEACHERS PLUS THE HEADMASTER.THE SCHOOL HAS A CARETAKER,WELFARE ASSISTANT,A COOK(WITH TWO HELPERS),FOUR MIDDAY SUPERVISORS AND A PART-TIME SECRETARY. THE CLASSES VARY IN SIZE SLIGHTLY BUT AVERAGE OUT AT 35 (QUITE LARGE BY TODAYS STANDARDS.) THE FACILITIES OF THE SCHOOL INCLUDE A PLAYING FIELD, OPEN-AIR SWIMMING POOL,TWO HALLS AND A CRAFT-ROOM (WHICH IS USED FOR A VARIETY OF LESSONS). THESE ARE IN ADDITION TO THE CLASSROOMS. THE CHILDREN OF THE SCHOOL COME FROM STONE,DINTON,BISHOPSTONE,CUDDINGTON, CHEARSLEY AND QUITE A FEW TRAVEL FROM AYLESBURY EACH DAY.
